We also have a superb collection of Von Zipper goggles in the Shade Station goggles collection. With fun and vibrant designs for every face size, these goggles feature high tech functions – one of the most exciting and innovative being the Von Zipper Skullcandy Replicator goggles which incorporate removable headphones. The Von Zipper goggles include a dual layer anti-fog coated cylindrical lens, which is perfect for all manner of weather conditions and ensures maximum visibility. The goggles also feature lens venting for maximum air circulation and a fleece lined, triple density face foam for a lightweight finish. These goggles provide 100% UV light protection and are helmet compatible.

A further Von Zipper design to look out for are the Dojo goggles which in typical Von Zipper style, boast a fierce and vibrant aesthetic and incorporate superior functions including a thermo-Polyurethane frame that remains flexible in all conditions and integrated forward lens venting for maximum air circulation. All Von Zipper goggles are immediately distinctive to the brand; featuring either the VZ initials logo or the full Von Zipper logo upon the side strap.
ferragamo shoesWe understand exactly what is required from a great pair of goggles and many pro-athletes, riders and snow sport icons consistently wear and praise the goggles by all the above brands, which is testament to just how effective they are in terms of safety, performance, durability and style. Due to the wide variety of options available, you can definitely tailor the look of your goggles to match that of your personality and really make a statement up on the slopes! Each brand boasts a highly distinctive look – some favouring more vibrant and colourful patterned goggles whilst others are more understated and demure, so you can be sure to find a pair of ski or snowboard goggles which suit your style, and of course, provide the ultimate protection.

Make sure you keep up to date with our Shade Station Style Blog, which provides updates on new goggles brands in stock and the current key styles to look out for. You can also follow us on Twitter @shadestation for daily style and stock updates.

Yet our reports still go on and we still have limited yet ongoing coverage on Iran... and we owe it all to the bloggers of Iran, a group mostly made up of young Iranians who decided that it is of utmost importance to let people know what is happening in their country. These young bloggers put themselves at great personal risk by attending the demonstrations (declared illegal by government) where they are subject to violence and arrests. Md Nazrul Islam, proprietor of Western Shoes at Eastern Mollica in Dhaka, has arranged a collection of footwear for ladies and gents this Eid. The market is situated on Elephant Road, one of the busiest areas in the capital for different styles of shoes. "hermes handbags birkin
I bought shoes of different designs worth 1 million taka (US$13,000) before the month of Ramadan. Now I need more shoes for the rest of the month, as demand for shoes never declines," Islam said. "Monthly sales figures at my shop before the month of Ramadan stood between 110,000 and 115,000 taka. Now the amount will cross the 1,500,000-taka-mark for sure. It's all because of Eid." He sold shoes worth 50,000 taka on Monday that was a government holiday, up from 35,000 taka on the day before.
he sold shoes worth 60,000 taka on Monday, which was a little lower than last Friday's sale of 65,000 taka. Islam said he started his business with shoes from importers at City Super Market at Gulistan in Dhaka. "All kinds of shoes are found there. Some businessmen also make shoes from Siddik Bazar of the same area. The bazar consists of many factories that make shoes on demand," he added.
he businessman said local shoes are gainingnike shox turbo popularity in the country, as people have seen a sharp fall in the quality of branded shoes. There was a time when I could pass a year at school with a branded pair of shoe. But now, I doubt that," said Razon Mirdha, an apparel businessman. Mirdha said he bought a pair of a branded shoe last year, but the experience was not good. "It lasted only three months. It's peculiar but I don't think it happens in every case." slam said some people claim the quality of all kinds of shoes has declined. "It is true in some cases. Some branded shoe providers are now selling imported Chinese shoes under the same names. The quality of these shoes is not as good."Regular shoes and shoes on sale have separate buyers. "Big players in the field, like Bata and Apex, are not our competitors. And everyone does not buy the shoes that are on sale," Islam said. That is a good motivation for winning the group.”The Argentinean side is peppered with names that demand respect throughout the rugby world. Seasoned front-rowers like Rodrigo Roncero and Mario Ledesma are backed up by the likes of Patricio Albacete and Juan Martin Fernandez Lobbe in the back row.he forwards will again be the dominant aspect of the Puma game but behind the scrum the backs are marshalled by the perenially excellent Felipe Contepomi.Lobbe is 29 but the rest of those key players are all over 30 with Ledesma now the senior citizen at 38. Quesada, though, rejects the suggestion that the team is too old“If you look at Ledesma and Roncero (both 34), well yes you can say they are very experienced. We are not used to seeing players still playing at this level at this age.But last season, Ledesma was still first choice hooker for Clermont. Even if he is getting older, he is still playing at a very high level and his presence is still important for the spirit of the team.”The one glaring absentee is the mercurial flyhalf come fullback Juan Martin Hernandez who was left out of the sqaud after failing to recover from a knee ligament injury. South Africa may have won the World Cup four years ago, but the team that turned the 2007 tournament upside down was Argentina.After shocking their French hosts in the opening match in Paris with a performance that was a wonderful balance between defensive pragmatism and offensive daring, the Pumas went on to reach the semi-finals for the first time.They came up short against the Springboks but bounced back to mug the French for a second Ed hardy swimsuits
time to take the third-place play-off.Argentinean rugby was firmly on the map.
t had been a long journey. The game arrived courtesy of British and Irish immigrants in the 19th century, the first match played in 1873.The national team took to the stage against a touring team from Britain in 1910 so, in spite of some good results over the years, it took nearly a century for the South Americans to claim their place beyond all doubt at the top table.The only problem is that they now face the task of performing with equal distinction.The puma sneakers
new generation is feeling the pressure," former Puma Gonzalo Quesada, top points scorer at the 1999 World Cup when they reached the last eight, told AFP."Everyone is expecting the same thing, and that is not going to be easy."

"I have three pair, and they're the most comfortable shoes I have. Once you start wearing them, you understand why people love them."But a debate about the benefits and safety of barefoot running has developed.roponents believe that traditional running shoes, which often have arch supports, stiff soles and thick, cushy heels, are over-engineered; that they make the feet weak, promote a hard heel-strike and don't prevent injuries. Running barefoot or in shoes like the Vibrams, they say, forces runners to land on their forefeet with a softer impact and strengthens the puma speed cat feet and lower legs.
Skeptics want to see proof. They believe that messing with a runner's natural stride leads to injuries. They even have their own website, barefootrunningisbad.com.
Book of Daniel Lieberman, puma ferrari prof of homo evolutionary biota at Harvard University University, studies the biomechanics from endurance running aside comparison barefoot runners with those who article of clothing traditional being given horseshoes. He has found that barefoot blue runner* land more cautious than shod runners who land heavily along their blackguards.
